In \"Arroz e Feijão\" (Rice and Beans), owner of a boarding-house seduces her young countryboy tenant. In \"As Três Virgens\" (The Three Virgins) three spinsters are influenced by the behaviour of their teenager niece, whom they are lodging. In \"O Arremate\" (The Purchase) a colonist turns his virgin daughter in to a landowner, to have his debts forgiven. And, finally, in \"Vereda Tropical\" (Tropical Trail), a man becomes sexually obsessed by a watermelon, to the point of having sexual intercourse with it. The stories are based on prize-winner short stories, from a Playboy contest.","poster_path":"/5bxMxVJ2cPFYSpJr3VeonZT6w5q.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"pt","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":2.485,"release_date":"1980-03-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":"/velHX5SWHVlEDRRljtxSi6YbSju.jpg","id":7219,"title":"Zombie Flesh Eaters","original_title":"Zombi 2","overview":"On the Caribbean island of Matul, white doctor David Menard is trying to stem the tide of cannibal zombies that are returning from the dead. Lucio Fulci, a filmmaker with a reputation for gruesome horror films. His body of work has started to plague his mental state, and he is haunted by the grotesque set-pieces his mind has conjured up during his career. His psychiatrist, Egon Schwarz, uses a hypnotised Fulci as an avatar to carry out his own disturbed fantasies, in hopes of ruining the master’s reputation once and for all.","poster_path":"/7slcRVlqFthzjTbnXFLoQ7LE053.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[27,35],"popularity":10.935,"release_date":"1990-08-08","video":false,"vote_average":5.7,"vote_count":137},{"backdrop_path":"/kuPzbd0j1zN9J9tNBJgoCKvsk4t.jpg","id":333696,"title":"Naked Among Wolves","original_title":"Nackt unter Wölfen","overview":"Taking place at the Concentration camp Buchenwald at the end of March 1945, prisoner Hans Pippig discovers in a carrying case of an incoming prisoner a Jewish child.
